vg = require('vega-lite')

viewof wetted = Inputs.range(
  [0, 10], 
  {value: 5, step: 0.1, label: "Wetted width ():"}
);
viewof substrate = Inputs.range(
  [0, 10], 
  {value: 5, step: 0.1, label: "Substrate size ():"}
);
viewof percent = Inputs.range(
  [0, 20], 
  {value: 10, step: 0.1, label: "Percent lake ():"}
);

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
//| panel: fill

function myFunction(wetted, substrate, percent) {
  return aq.table({
  'wetted': [wetted, wetted, wetted, wetted],
  'substrate': [substrate, substrate, substrate, substrate],
  'percent': [percent, percent, percent, percent],
  'response_type': ["Invertebrate biomass ()", "Periphyton biomass ()", "Invertebrate diversity", "Par length (cm)"],
  'response_predict': [0.83-0.095*wetted+0.03*substrate, 0.44+0.026*wetted+0.32*percent, 0.7+0.0016*substrate, 0.1+0.06*wetted],
  'image_path': ["https://github.com/emmwilson/exploits_predictions/blob/f21d4f3b41a6d8e2b940a71faf2dc37451d0e730/data/invert.png","https://github.com/emmwilson/exploits_predictions/blob/f21d4f3b41a6d8e2b940a71faf2dc37451d0e730/data/embed.png","https://github.com/emmwilson/exploits_predictions/blob/f21d4f3b41a6d8e2b940a71faf2dc37451d0e730/data/invert_div.png","https://github.com/emmwilson/exploits_predictions/blob/f21d4f3b41a6d8e2b940a71faf2dc37451d0e730/data/par_len.png"]
})
}

predictions_ps = myFunction(wetted, substrate, percent)


weatherColors = ["darkgray", "steelblue", "paleturquoise", "gold"] 

Plot.plot({
  width: Math.max(width, 550),
  height: Math.floor(0.5 * width),
  marginLeft: 0,
  marginRight: 0,
  marginBottom: 150,
  colour: {legend: false},
  y: {domain: [0,8], axis: null},
  x: {label: "Response type"},
  marks:[
    Plot.axisX({fontSize: 18}),
    Plot.barY(predictions_ps,
     {x: "response_type",
     y: "response_predict",
     fill: "response_type"}),
    Plot.text(predictions_ps, {x: "response_type", y: "response_predict", text: "response_predict", dy: -7, lineAnchor: "bottom", fontSize: 25}),
    Plot.image(predictions_ps, 
      {x: "response_type",
      y: [-1.2, -1.2, -1.2, -1.2],
      src: "image_path",
      width: 100
      })
   ]
})
```
